enumeratedValues.name: WDT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Assert WDOG_B upon a Watchdog Time-out event.

fields.name: SRE
fields.description: Software Reset Extension, an optional way to generate software reset

enumeratedValues.name: SRE_0
enumeratedValues.description: using original way to generate software reset (default)

enumeratedValues.name: SRE_1
enumeratedValues.description: using new way to generate software reset.

enumeratedValues.name: WSR_21845
enumeratedValues.description: Write to the Watchdog Service Register (WDOG_WSR).

enumeratedValues.name: WSR_43690
enumeratedValues.description: Write to the Watchdog Service Register (WDOG_WSR).

enumeratedValues.name: SFTW_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not the result of a software reset.

enumeratedValues.name: SFTW_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is the result of a software reset.

enumeratedValues.name: TOUT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not the result of a WDOG timeout.

enumeratedValues.name: TOUT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is the result of a WDOG timeout.

enumeratedValues.name: POR_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is not the result of a power on reset.

enumeratedValues.name: POR_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset is the result of a power on reset.

enumeratedValues.name: WICT_0
enumeratedValues.description: WICT[7:0] = Time duration between interrupt and time-out is 0 seconds.

enumeratedValues.name: WICT_1
enumeratedValues.description: WICT[7:0] = Time duration between interrupt and time-out is 0.5 seconds.

enumeratedValues.name: WICT_4
enumeratedValues.description: WICT[7:0] = Time duration between interrupt and time-out is 2 seconds (Default).

enumeratedValues.name: WICT_255
enumeratedValues.description: WICT[7:0] = Time duration between interrupt and time-out is 127.5 seconds.

enumeratedValues.name: PDE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Power Down Counter of WDOG is disabled.

enumeratedValues.name: PDE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Power Down Counter of WDOG is enabled (Default).
